inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//total volume
Syslog
| where HostName contains 'juniper'
| summarize LogVolume=count() by TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//process trend
Syslog
| where HostName contains 'juniper' 
| summarize ProcessCount=count() by ProcessName, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//type trend over all
Syslog
| where HostName contains 'juniper'
| extend SessionType= extract('^(.*?):',1,SyslogMessage)
| where SessionType  !=''
| summarize SessionTypeCount=count() by SessionType, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Syslog
| where HostName contains 'juniper'
| where ProcessName =~ 'RT_FLOW'
| extend SessionType= extract('^(.*?):',1,SyslogMessage)
| where SessionType  !=''
| summarize SessionTypeCount=count() by SessionType

content.PartTitle: RT flow session type summary, by count

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Session Close Reason Summary
Syslog
| where HostName contains 'juniper'
| extend Reason= extract('.*?: session closed (.*?):',1,SyslogMessage)
| where Reason  !=''
| summarize ReasonCount= count() by Reason
| top 5 by ReasonCount desc

content.PartTitle: Session close reason summary, by count

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//process count
Syslog
| where HostName contains 'juniper'
| summarize ProcessCount=count() by ProcessName
| sort by ProcessCount desc nulls last

settings.content: Top 5 IP Adresses Inbound And Outbound

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Outbound Source IP Addresses
Syslog
| where HostName contains 'juniper'
| where SyslogMessage contains 'default-permit trust untrust'
| extend SourceIP=extract('([0-9.].*?)/[0-9].*?->',1,SyslogMessage)
| summarize SourceIPCount=count() by SourceIP
| top 5 by SourceIPCount desc nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Outbound Destination IP Addresses
Syslog
| where HostName contains 'juniper'
| where SyslogMessage contains 'default-permit trust untrust'
| extend DestinationIP=extract('->([0-9.].*?)/[0-9].*?',1,SyslogMessage)
| summarize DestinationIPCount=count() by DestinationIP
| top 5 by DestinationIPCount desc nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Inbound Source IP Addresses
Syslog
| where HostName contains 'juniper'
| where SyslogMessage contains 'server-access untrust trust'
| extend SourceIP=extract('([0-9.].*?)/[0-9].*?->',1,SyslogMessage)
| summarize SourceIPCount=count() by SourceIP
| top 5 by SourceIPCount desc nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Inbound Destination IP Addresses
Syslog
| where HostName contains 'juniper'
| where SyslogMessage contains 'server-access untrust trust'
| extend DestinationIP=extract('->([0-9.].*?)/[0-9].*?',1,SyslogMessage)
| summarize DestinationIPCount=count() by DestinationIP
| top 5 by DestinationIPCount desc nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
// top source port
Syslog
| where HostName contains 'juniper'
| extend DestinationPort=extract('[0-9.].*?/([0-9].*?)->',1,SyslogMessage)
| summarize DestinationPortCount=count() by DestinationPort
| top 5 by DestinationPortCount desc nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//top destination port
Syslog
| where HostName contains 'juniper'
| extend DestinationPort=extract('->[0-9.].*?/([0-9].*?) ',1,SyslogMessage)
| summarize DestinationPortCount=count() by DestinationPort
| top 5 by DestinationPortCount desc nulls last

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Type count trend mgd
Syslog
| where HostName contains 'juniper'
| where ProcessName =~ 'mgd'
| extend SessionType= extract('^(.*?):',1,SyslogMessage)
| where SessionType  !=''
| summarize SessionTypeCount=count() by SessionType, TimeGenerated

content.PartTitle: Device config change count time trend

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Syslog
| where HostName contains 'juniper'Â 
| extend SessionType= extract('^(.*?):',1,SyslogMessage)Â 
| where SessionTypeÂ  !contains 'RT_FLOW'
| where SessionType !=''
| summarize SessionTypeCount=count() by SessionType

content.PartTitle: Non flow session summary, by count

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
// user access for management
Syslog
| where HostName contains 'juniper'
| where ProcessName =~ 'mgd'
| extend UserName=extract('User '(.*?)'',1,SyslogMessage)
| summarize UserCount=count() by UserName
| top 5 by UserCount desc nulls last
